title: Gold V - Looking to join ranked 5's team
body:
Hi,

My IGN: Lordloss73
Main roles: adc top or jungle, but can fill if needed.
I play nearly every night so won't be hard to organise a game.
Have skype or could get any other VOI program if that's easier.

Wanting to join 5's due to improve overall and take the game a little more seriously than those in solo queue.
Add me in game or post a message here and i'll get back to you.
